text: khux brrda phu thi yud xea sasna khxng phwk khea pen sing hı khwam phelidphelin læa pen khxnglen læa chiwit khwam pen xyu hæng lok ni kdi hlxklwng phwk khea dwy dangnan wan ni rea ca lum phwk khea bang dang thi phwk khea di lum kar phb kab wan khxng phwk khea ni læa kar thi phwk khea ptiseth brrda xongkar khxng khea
